sections.title: Interface Types
sections.content:
Reticulum supports these interface types (from source code):

  • AutoInterface
  • TCPServerInterface
  • TCPClientInterface
  • UDPInterface
  • I2PInterface
  • RNodeInterface
  • RNodeMultiInterface
  • SerialInterface
  • KISSInterface
  • AX25KISSInterface
  • PipeInterface
  • BackboneInterface (Linux/Android only)
  • BackboneClientInterface (Linux/Android only)

sections.title: TCPClientInterface
sections.content:
Connect to a remote transport node.

[[RNS Testnet Amsterdam]]
  type = TCPClientInterface
  enabled = yes
  target_host = amsterdam.connect.reticulum.network
  target_port = 4965

Parameters

ParameterRequiredDescription
target_hostYesHostname or IP
target_portYesPort number
kiss_framingNoUse KISS framing
i2p_tunneledNoConnection via I2P
connect_timeoutNoConnection timeout
max_reconnect_triesNoReconnection attempts

sections.title: Public Transport Nodes
sections.content:
Verified active from LFM production node (Dec 2025). Check rmap.world for live status.

HostPortNotes

sydney.reticulum.au4242Sydney
rns.jaykayenn.net4242SE Asia
firezen.com4242FireZen
93.95.227.8499520rbit-Net
202.61.243.414965noDNS1
193.26.158.2304965noDNS2
45.77.109.864965US-East
Node availability changes. Always check rmap.world for current status.

sections.title: TCPServerInterface
sections.content:
Accept incoming connections.

[[TCP Server]]
  type = TCPServerInterface
  enabled = yes
  listen_ip = 0.0.0.0
  listen_port = 4242

Parameters

ParameterRequiredDescription
listen_ipNoIP to bind (default: 0.0.0.0)
listen_portYesPort to listen on
deviceNoBind to specific device
prefer_ipv6NoPrefer IPv6
i2p_tunneledNoConnections via I2P

sections.title: AutoInterface
sections.content:
Automatic local discovery. Enabled by default.

[[Default Interface]]
  type = AutoInterface
  enabled = yes

Parameters

ParameterDescription
group_idGroup identifier for peering
discovery_scopeMulticast discovery scope
discovery_portPort for discovery
data_portPort for data
multicast_address_typeMulticast addressing type
devicesAllowed network interfaces (list)
ignored_devicesExcluded interfaces (list)
configured_bitrateCustom bitrate

sections.title: RNodeInterface
sections.content:
LoRa radio via RNode hardware.

[[RNode LoRa]]
  type = RNodeInterface
  enabled = yes
  port = /dev/ttyUSB0
  frequency = 915000000
  bandwidth = 125000
  txpower = 17
  spreadingfactor = 8
  codingrate = 5

Parameters

ParameterRequiredDescription
portYesSerial port, tcp://, or ble://
frequencyYesFrequency in Hz
bandwidthNoBandwidth in Hz
txpowerNoTX power in dBm
spreadingfactorNoSF 5-12
codingrateNoCR 5-8
flow_controlNoEnable flow control
id_callsignNoStation callsign
id_intervalNoID interval (seconds)
airtime_limit_shortNoShort-term airtime limit %
airtime_limit_longNoLong-term airtime limit %

sections.title: I2PInterface
sections.content:
Anonymous connectivity via I2P. Requires i2pd running locally.

Connect to LFM I2P Server

[[LFM I2P]]
  type = I2PInterface
  enabled = yes
  peers = kfamlmwnlw3acqfxip4x6kt53i2tr4ksp5h4qxwvxhoq7mchpolq.b32.i2p

Run Your Own I2P Server

[[My I2P Server]]
  type = I2PInterface
  enabled = yes
  connectable = yes

When connectable = yes, your node creates an I2P tunnel others can connect to.

Other Verified I2P Peers

NodeB32 AddressStatus (Dec 2025)
LFM Serverkfamlmwnlw3acqfxip4x6kt53i2tr4ksp5h4qxwvxhoq7mchpolq.b32.i2pUp
RNS Testnet Hubg3br23bvx3lq5uddcsjii74xgmn6y5q325ovrkq2zw2wbzbqgbuq.b32.i2pUp
Rothbard ZAguuahj7pyb6ksmjv2bqrjg4cs2wou6cor3ivsi6crntqbzsxnbna.b32.i2pUp
Rhein Ruhruwafw2ibzgbk5wteqvcip65mtzatjckzo5avfur7vg5asg47oxkq.b32.i2pUp
Note: I2P tunnels take 2-3 minutes to establish after startup.

sections.title: KISSInterface
sections.content:
Packet radio TNCs using KISS protocol.

[[Packet Radio]]
  type = KISSInterface
  enabled = yes
  port = /dev/ttyUSB1
  speed = 115200
  databits = 8
  parity = none
  stopbits = 1
  preamble = 150
  txtail = 10
  persistence = 200
  slottime = 20

sections.title: AX25KISSInterface
sections.content:
Amateur radio with AX.25 framing.

[[AX.25 Radio]]
  type = AX25KISSInterface
  enabled = yes
  callsign = YOURCALL
  ssid = 0
  port = /dev/ttyUSB2
  speed = 115200
  databits = 8
  parity = none
  stopbits = 1
  preamble = 150
  txtail = 10
  persistence = 200
  slottime = 20

sections.title: SerialInterface
sections.content:
Raw serial port connection.

[[Serial Link]]
  type = SerialInterface
  enabled = yes
  port = /dev/ttyUSB0
  speed = 115200
  databits = 8
  parity = none
  stopbits = 1

sections.title: PipeInterface
sections.content:
External program via stdin/stdout.

[[Pipe]]
  type = PipeInterface
  enabled = yes
  command = netcat -l 5757
  respawn_delay = 5
